metadata.title: CVE-2016-2775 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ISC BIND 9.x before 9.9.9-P2, 9.10.x before 9.10.4-P2, and 9.11.x before9.11.0b2, when lwresd or the named lwres option is enabled, allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via a long requestthat uses the lightweight resolver protocol.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
